question_text: I am 18+ and consent to take part. I understand anonymised data will be published openly.
description: Consent to participate and allow anonymised data to be published.
values: Allowed values: yes

question_text: Which best describes your current work status?
description: Current employment status
values: Allowed values: employed_full_time; employed_part_time; self_employed_freelance

question_text: Do you use any AI tools or features in your work
description: Frequency of AI tool usage in participant's work
values: Allowed values: yes_daily; yes_weekly; yes_occasionally; no_never

question_text: My work still feels central to who I am.
description: Perceived centrality of work to personal identity.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: AI makes me question my value at work.
description: Extent to which AI prompts questioning of personal value at work.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I find a sense of purpose in my work even as AI tools spread.
description: Sense of purpose in work despite increasing AI adoption.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I feel in control of how AI is used in my role.
description: Perceived control over AI usage in participant’s role.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: When AI helps my output I receive fair credit/recognition.
description: Perceived fairness of credit/recognition when AI contributes to work output.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I can be open about concerns or mistakes with AI at work without negative consequences.
description: Psychological safety around discussing AI-related concerns or mistakes at work.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I worry my skills will become obsolete because of AI.
description: Concern about skill obsolescence due to AI.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: I am actively upskilling to stay relevant alongside AI.
description: Self-reported upskilling to remain relevant alongside AI.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: My sense of belonging in my team has changed because of AI.
description: Perceived change in team belonging due to AI.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Much less belonging ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Much more belonging

question_text: AI has increased the pace/expectations of my work.
description: Perceived increase in work pace or expectations due to AI.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: AI has increased the expectation to be available or produce outside normal hours.
description: Perceived increase in out-of-hours expectations due to AI.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: Using AI at work carries stigma (e.g. seen as cheating or less skilled)
description: Perceived stigma associated with using AI at work.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: The way AI is used in my workplace aligns with my personal ethics.
description: Perceived ethical alignment of workplace AI usage.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question_text: How aligned is your work with your personal values right now?
description: Perceived alignment between work and personal values.
values: Scale 0-10 0 = Not at all; 10 = Completely

question_text: How clear do you feel about your priorities and decisions at work?
description: Clarity of work priorities and workplace decision-making.
values: Scale 0-10 0 = Not at all; 10 = Completely

question_text: How is your emotional energy most days at work?
description: Self-reported emotional energy at work.
values: Scale 0-10 0 = Very depleted; 10 = Very energised

question_text: In general, how much do you trust information you use at work (from people, systems, and tools)?
description: Trust in work-related information sources.
values: Scale 0-10 0 = Not at all; 10 = Completely

question_text: Which feels more true today?
description: Selection between two identity-related statements.
values: Allowed values: people_understand_better; ai_understands_better; depends_same; prefer_not_to_say

question_text: I have felt cheerful and in good spirits
description: WHO-5 item: feeling cheerful and in good spirits.
values: Scale 1 - 5 1= At no time ; 5 = All of the time

question_text: I have felt calm and relaxed.
description: WHO-5 item: feeling calm and relaxed.
values: Scale 1 - 5 1= At no time ; 5 = All of the time

question_text: I have felt active and vigorous
description: WHO-5 item: feeling active and vigorous.
values: Scale 1 - 5 1= At no time ; 5 = All of the time

question_text: I woke up feeling fresh and rested.
description: WHO-5 item: waking up feeling fresh and rested.
values: Scale 1 - 5 1= At no time ; 5 = All of the time

question_text: My daily life has been filled with things that interest me.
description: WHO-5 item: daily life filled with things of interest.
values: Scale 1 - 5 1= At no time ; 5 = All of the time

question_text: In your own words, how (if at all) has AI changed your sense of who you are at work?
description: Open-text: how AI has changed the participant’s sense of identity at work.
values: Open-text responses describing how AI has affected participants’ sense of identity at work. Minimal cleaning applied (whitespace trimming, newline removal). Raw wording preserved exactly. Empty string indicates no response

question_text: What single change would make AI improve your identity and purpose at work?
description: Open-text: suggested change that would improve identity or purpose at work with AI.
values: Open-text responses describing what changes to AI systems or workplace AI use would improve participants’ sense of identity or purpose at work. Minimal cleaning applied (whitespace trimming, newline removal). Raw wording preserved exactly. Empty string indicates no response

question_text: Please select "Agree" for this statement. (Fail = optional exclusion)
description: Attention-check item requiring “Agree” response.
values: Allowed values:pass; fail

question_text: Which industry best fits your main work?
description: Participant’s primary work industry.
values: Allowed values: agriculture_forestry_fishing; mining_energy_utilities; manufacturing_production; construction_trades; transport_logistics_warehousing; retail_sales_consumer_services; hospitality_food_tourism; media_arts_entertainment; information_technology_software; finance_banking_insurance; real_estate_property_services; professional_scientific_technical_services; education_training; health_social_care; government_public_administration; defence_emergency_services; nonprofit_community_charity_work; legal_compliance; marketing_advertising_communications; other

question_text: What best describes your current role level or seniority?
description: Participant’s role level or seniority.
values: Allowed values: entry_level; intermediate_experienced; senior_specialist; manager_team_leader; director_executive; owner_founder; other

question_text: How many people work at your organisation (including all locations)?
description: Total size of participant’s organisation.
values: Allowed values: just_me; 2_9; 10_49; 50_249; 250_999; 1000_4999; 5000_or_more; not_sure

question_text: How many hours do you usually work each week (paid work only)?
description: Weekly paid working hours.
values: Allowed values: less_than_10; 10_19; 20_29; 30_39; 40_49; 50_or_more

question_text: Roughly what percentage of your tasks involve AI tools or outputs?
description: Percentage of work tasks involving AI tools or AI-generated outputs

question_text: How long have you been in your current role?
description: Tenure in current role.
values: Allowed values: less_than_6_months; 6_11_months; 1_2_years; 3_5_years; 6_10_years; more_than_10_years

question_text: What is your age group?
description: Age category.

question_text: Country of residence
description: Country participant lives in.
values: Allowed values (ISO-like codes): au; ca; ie; nz; uk; us

question_text: Which of the following best describes your gender?
description: Participant gender identity.
values: Allowed values: man; woman; non_binary; prefer_not_to_say

question_text: Free-text industry response (if “Other” was selected).
description: Free-text industry response when “other” industry is selected; stored exactly as typed.
values: Free-text (no predefined allowed values).

question_text: Free-text role seniority response (if “Other” was selected).
description: Free-text seniority response when “other” role level is selected; stored exactly as typed.
values: Free-text (no predefined allowed values).
